biotools.summary: It is a dedicated insertion sequence (IS) database which assigns names to individual ISs to maintain a coherent nomenclature, an IS repositaory including >3000 individual ISs from both bacteria and archaea and provides a basis for IS classification. Each IS is indexed in ISfinder with various associated pieces of information and classified into a group or family to provide some insight into its phylogeny.

bioschemas.name: ISfinder
bioschemas.summary: It is a dedicated insertion sequence (IS) database which assigns names to individual ISs to maintain a coherent nomenclature, an IS repositaory including >3000 individual ISs from both bacteria and archaea and provides a basis for IS classification.
